Wallet.NoWalletErrorMsg: No wallet detected, please install {0} first.
Wallet.MainChainUnmatch: Your wallet network does not match the network you choose. Please switch to {0} of Ethereum and retry.

Brokers.BrokerCodeNotExist: The Broker Code you submit does not exist

OpenPosition.TwoWayOpenPriceTypeError: You can only place Two-way positions via market order

Account.AmountExceedsError: Amount exceeds the limit, please retry

SetStopPricePopup.StopPriceProfitNotice: When Market Price reaches {0}, it will trigger Take Profit Market order to close this position, Estimated profit will be {1} USDT.
SetStopPricePopup.StopPriceLossNotice: When Market Price reaches {0}, it will trigger Stop Loss Market order to close this position, Estimated loss will be {1} USDT.

ClosePosition.ClosePositionPopupInfo: Click to close all positions at Market Price

Hint.PCFRateDetail: Transactions that increase system risk have to reward transactions that decrease system risk. Positive rate means PCF payment is required for opening long/closing short, and opening short/closing long gets the PCF reward, vice versa. Detailed rules click here.
Hint.PositionMiningAPYDetail: The higher the leverage of positions, the higher the APY of position mining will be. Mining rules click here.
Hint.UnrealizedPnLOfLong: Unrealized P&L of Long Position = (Current Derivative Price – Average Position Price) * Position Held
Hint.UnrealizedPnLOfShort: Unrealized P&L of Short Position = (Average Position Price - Current Derivative Price) * Position Held
Hint.CurrentPriceDetail: Current Derivative Price of the Platform
Hint.AveragePriceDetail: Average Opening Price for this Position
Hint.RiskDetail: Risk increases as the margin rate decreases. When the margin rate is smaller than the maintenance margin 3%, the auto deleveraging will be triggered. Detailed rules click here>>
Hint.LiquidationPriceDetail: This price is the expected mandatory liquidation price. If the derivative price is lower than this price (long position) or higher than this price (short position), your position will be liquidated automatically. Know more>>
Hint.OrderPriceDetail: Target execution price of this order.
Hint.OrderVolumeDetail: The volume of asset this order will be trading.
Hint.OrderTimeDetail: The moment this order is placed.
Hint.StopLossSettingDetail: When the SL price is reached, system will be automatically close your position to prevent further loss.
Hint.TakeProfitSettingDetail: When the TP price is reached, system will be automatically close your position to realize your current profit.
Hint.PnLDetail1: The realized profit and loss of a position.
Hint.PnLDetail2: Long position PnL = (Close Price - Open Price) * Amount
Hint.PnLDetail3: Short position PnL = (Open Price - Close Price) * Amount
Hint.ClosePriceDetail: The price when you close your position.
Hint.CloseVolumeDetail: The volume of asset this order will be closing.
Hint.CloseAmountDetail: Close Amount = Close Price * Close Volume
Hint.TradingFeeDetail: Trading Fees when you close position.
Hint.PCFDetail: PCF rewards (negative) or payment (positive) when you close your position.
